resources.string: "%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Please connect the App before flying
Compass error, please restart the aircraft
Data error, please update No Fly Zone
Cannot use the function under current mode
Failed to set home point, cannot execute
System initialization error, please restart the aircraft
Switching is not supported under current mode
Motor is locked, please check motor
Failed to set waypoint, it is recommended to reset
Aircraft in attitude mode, positioning unavailable
Flight is not allowed in No Fly Zone
Waypoints abnormal, it is recommended to rearrange waypoints
Auto RTH ON, please move the key to the left
Aircraft in VPU mode, positioning unavailable
Aircraft taking off automatically, please do not move stick
Please connect to RC before calibration
Please connect to aircraft before calibration
Gimbal in auto calibration, please wait
The temperature of gimbal is too low, please preheat for calibration
The temperature fluctuation of gimbal is large, please calibrate later
The angle of gimbal is not correct
Low battery of aircraft, please land immediately
RTH altitude should be no more than %1$d%2$s, current RTH altitude modified
Cannot load flight record, please try later

"Turning on VPU mode, please read below contents carefully: 1.For safety reason, please fly in wide area with clear ground texture and brightness > 15Lx. Altitude limit: 0.5m~2.5m. 2.You need skills and experience under ATTI for safe flight. Aircraft will auto switch to ATTI mode when VPU mode not work. 3. Accident of indoor flight is not included in the insurance, please install the protection frame and fly carefully."
"If the battery of aircraft is lower than 30%, aircraft should return to Home"
The difference of battery voltage is too large
"Please use the battery to 15%, then wait and let the battery self-discharge to 0, the capacity will be updated"
"Keep the landing gear open, do not hold the landing gear. Keep away from metal and high interference areas"
Calibration failed, please connect to RC
Aircraft is in compass calibration, please restart the aircraft and try again.
Compass calibration complete, please wait, aircraft auto restarting
Aircraft is in compass calibration, please restart the aircraft
Please connect to RC before calibration
Compass calibration time out, please follow the guide strictly to complete calibration
Calibration failure, please be aware of interference of surrounding environments
For safety reason, gimbal cannot be calibrated during the flight
Push or pull all sticks to their maximum range several times
until the position of the stick is consistent with the actual position
Please connect to aircraft before calibration
For safety reason, RC cannot be calibrated during the flight
Cannot update, TF card remaining capacity less than 80M
Could take off in attitude mode
Could take off in GPS mode
Could take off in VPU mode
Downloading firmware, click again to cancel download
Cannot set Tap-fly under VPU mode or ATTI mode
Cannot set Orbit under VPU mode or ATTI mode
Cannot set Dronie under VPU/ATTI mode
Cannot set Waypoint under VPU mode or ATTI mode
Currently under VPU mode, cannot execute Dronie mission
Currently under ATTI mode, cannot execute Dronie mission
Detected that TF card requires formatting
Stick mode change will directly affect operation logic of the aircraft, are you sure to switch?
Please turn off the aircraft before switching stick mode
Please turn off the aircraft before RC calibration
Please restart the aircraft and then retry compass calibration
A crash message has been sent to server, we will solve the problem ASAP!
Please keep your aircraft stable, do not move the aircraft during calibration
Please connect RC and drone before update
Please follow the instructions when updating
Please connect all devices to complete the update.
Connect RC and phone with USB or Wi-Fi
"In far distance or interfered environment, weak signal may cause blured view or connection error"
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
"Keep the landing gear open and do not hold it. Keep the aircraft horizontal and rotate until the green light goes out"
"Keep the landing gear open and do not hold it. Keep the aircraft vertical and rotate until the red light goes out"
Please press the power button and auto T/L button and hold until the beeping sound stopped
Gimbal not detected, please ensure gimbal is installed
Camera not connected, please connect the camera first
Please ensure the RC power is turned on.
Failed to connect phone and RC
Please connect to RC before calibration
Are you sure to delete selected item(s)?
Are you sure to delete %1$s selected item(s)?
Whether to delete the selected item(s)?
"Real time monitoring the aircraft condition, you can see all the problems here"
Please fly on ground with clear texture
Low precision of optical fow, please be careful of flight
Please return to Home and land
Battery temperature is too low, start the motor on the ground to preheat the battery
Gimbal requirs pre-heating, please wait 3 minutes
Please put the aircraft on a flat surface
GPS unavailable, please use RC to land
Aircraft battery is too low, please turn off and charge
Aircraft has reached max flight distance
Aircraft has reached max flight altitude
Gimbal possibly being interfered by an obstacle
The battery has been aging, affecting the flight, please replace the battery
Please check the battery of aircraft, or whether there is strong interference from environment.
For flight safety, the firmware version of FC should be 1889 or above
Please leave us your contact details, our PM will get back to you soon
Failed to submit, please try again!
Feedback should be no more than 1000 words.
Success feedback! Thank you. We will handle your information as soon as possible.
Please select a session related to the issue
Feedback should be no less than 5 words.
File is invalid, unable to load
Recording video, please pause and try again
Firmware download complete, please connect the aircraft to update
Update file of firmware does not exist
When setting Tap-fly, please be aware of altitude, choose open area, avoid obstacles such as crowds, high buildings, trees, power lines, signal towers etc.
When setting Orbit, please be aware of altitude, choose open area, avoid obstacles such as crowds, high buildings, trees, power lines, signal towers etc.
When setting waypoint, please be aware of altitude, choose open area, avoid obstacles such as crowds, high buildings, trees, power lines, signal towers etc.
When setting Dronie, please be aware of altitude, choose open area, avoid obstacles such as crowds, high buildings, trees, power lines, signal towers etc.
Cannot set waypoint in No Fly Zone

"Turning on ATTI mode, please read below contents carefully 1.ATTI is only available to experienced users, VPU mode and GPS mode are OFF under ATTI. 2.Under ATTI mode, the aircraft may drift, you need to manually control sticks to keep aircraft hover. There is a certain risk. 3.The following function is disabled: Auto-take-off, Auto-land, Tap-fly, Waypoint, Orbit. 4.Under ATTI mode, any incident caused by drone is not included in the drone insurance. "
Failed to format, no TF card found!
During the calibration, do not move the aircraft or quit the page
Please place the aircraft on a flat surface, do not move the aircraft during calibration process
Aircraft will return near to home point and land to the ground
"The GPS strength will directly influence the safety of aircraft. Please fly in less interfered environment"
Please do not move the drone during the process
JPG+RAW(only JPG can be saved when capturing)
Please fly in a brighter environment
The brightness of surroundings is low, please be careful of flight
Failed to check IMU, please retry!
Currently under ATTI mode, cannot execute Waypoint, Tap-fly, Orbit mission
Currently under VPU mode, cannot execute Waypoint, Tap-fly, Orbit mission
"Thanks for your support to Fimi, you get a free insurance (only for user who purchased Mi Drone)"
Please scan the barcode on product packaging, as shown below
Please place the barcode in the frame
Current calibration process will be interrupted. Are you sure?
Battery temperature is too low, please preheat to 15℃ or above
Low temperature battery and less than 80% charge, please charge or preheat
Compass error, please move aircraft or calibrate
Gimbal requires preheating, please wait 3 minutes
Please place the aircraft on a flat surface
Low battery, please charge or replace
Abnormal data of No Fly Zone, please update No Fly Zone
Battery temperature is too high, please replace the battery
Failed to set Home Point, it is recommended to restart the aircraft
The motor is locked, please check the motor status
System failed to initialize, please restart aircraft
Please fly above a clear, bright ground
Battery damaged, cannot be used anymore
Battery voltage too low, please charge immediately
Severely low battery, please charge immediately
Compass interfered, please take off in another place
Temperature of aircraft is too high, please turn off to lower the temperature
System failed to initialize, please restart aircraft
Approaching to No Fly Zone, please stop flying!
In No Fly Zone, unable to take off!
RC error, please restart or calibrate
Battery voltage unstable, please be careful
Aircraft will land on the ground, please make sure the ground is flat and away from crowds
Adjust the brightness of head lights
VPU return mode is invalid, please be careful of flight
Flight time has not reached 60 minutes, cannot close beginner mode; the current flight time total is: %1$s minutes
Tap here and display my position during the flight
Aircraft returning home because of disconnection
Please select which to be deleted
Please select item to be upload
Recommend for use in Mainland China
It is convenient to switch between Camera view / Map view

"Before your operation, please read below contents.
The flight distance of the aircraft should be in accordance with national, state and local regulations. If the flight distance of the aircraft exceeds the maximum distance permitted, you are responsible for the consequences of the flight. Xiaomi and Fimi shall not be responsible for any accidents after this operation."

"Before your operation, please read below statement.
The flight altitude of the aircraft should be in accordance with national, state and local regulations. For example, certain small commercial drones will be permitted to fly up to 400 feet (around 121.9m) under a policy announced by the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA). If the altitude of the aircraft exceeds the specified height, you are responsible for the consequences of the flight. Xiaomi and Fimi shall not be responsible for any accidents after this operation."
For safety reason, cannot update during the flight
Push right stick forward, aircraft fly forward, pull right stick backward, aircraft fly backward
Push right stick to the left, aircraft fly to left, push right stick to the right, aircraft fly to right
Push left stick forward, aircraft rises, pull left stick backward, aircraft declines
Push left stick to the left, aircraft will turn left, push left stick to the right, aircraft will turn right
Now are you familiar with the drone operation?
If this is your first time to use Mi Drone, it requires 60 minutes flight before turn off the Beginner Mode
Flight velocity is limited under Beginner Mode
Under Beginner Mode, altitude is limited to 50m, and distance is limited to 100m
Land: Tap Auto T/L button, then press and hold
Preparation: Place the aircraft on a flat surface 5 meters away, and ensure the power button and Auto Take Off / Land button of RC are white
Control: Use sticks to control the aircraft
Take off: Tap Auto T/L button, then press and hold
Start Motor: Pull both sticks to Pigeon - Toed position (shown as right), release sticks immediately after the motors start
Emergency Shutdown: Press the power button and Auto T/L button and hold until the beeping sound stopped
Stop Motor: Pull down the left stick to lowest and hold for 5 seconds after landing, motor will then stop
Open the landing gear and place the aircraft on a flat surface
Keep the tail towards you at all time
Battery side is the tail, the other side is the head
Please always keep at least 5 meters away from the aircraft
Please fly in open and safe area
Avoid obstacles such as crowds, high buildings, trees, power lines, signal towers, high ways, railways etc
Do not fly when rainy, windy or snowy
For flight safety, please read below contents to learn the basics during flight
Under Beginner Mode, altitude limit is 50m, and distance limit is 100m.
ATTI mode cannot be turned ON/OFF during flight
Cannot set RTH altitude during the flight
Cannot set flight distance during flight
Cannot set altitude limit during the flight
Beginner mode cannot be turned ON/OFF during flight
VPU mode cannot be turned ON/OFF during flight
Please tap Next to set params
Failed to shoot video, please retry
Operation too frequent, please try later
Disconnected from RC, please check whether pairing suceeds
Please press and hold the button as shown below to enable the pairing mode
Please press the button as shown below to enable the pairing mode
The process takes around 30 seconds, please wait
Please ensure RC power is turned on.
Aircraft motor turned on, can not calibrate the compass
Please format TF card before update
Please update the latest version of flight control
Please set destination on the map
Please set waypoints on the map
Low battery of RC, please charge
Please check the battery status of RC, or whether USB cable is well connected.
For safety reason, Wi-Fi cannot be changed during the flight
Password should be no less than 8 bits
Setup successfully, please connect to RC
Password should be no less than 8 bits
Push/pull stick of RC to see whether the displayed stick position is consistent with actual position
If not, then need to be calibrated
Calibration failed, not enough movement of sticks
Calibration failed, not enough movement of dials
Roll the dials and move the sticks of RC to see whether their displayed position is
consistent with the actual position. If not, then need to be calibrated
Before RC calibration, please power off the aircraft
Over discharge can permanently damage the battery
Battery damaged, please replace the battery
You are in No Fly Zone
Aircraft internal fault, please try to restart or return for maintenance
Affected by the environment, the sensor temperature is too low
Home point set, move to change
Setup failed, please connect the aircraft
Cannot set home point, too far away
Please fly above POI point for setting
"Use the right dial of RC to switch between GPS & ATTI mode"
Please connect to aircraft before setting
Press the power button of RC, then press and hold again
Press the power button of aircraft, then press and hold again
Battery cell may be damaged, please land immediately
Detected changes of flight field, it is recommended to recalibrate the compass
If picture lagged, please adjust antenna or keep away from sources of interference
The difference of battery voltage is too large, please land immediately
Battery cell maybe damaged, please replace the battery
Battery cell may be damaged, please land immediately
Compass error, please land immediately to calibrate
Low GPS precision, please be careful of flight
Low battery, please return to Home
Battery temperature is too high, please land immediately
Aircraft positioning signal precision is poor, please be careful of flight
Poor optical flow precision, please be careful of flight
Battery voltage too low, over discharge can permanently damage the battery, please land immediately
Severely low battery, over-discharge will damage battery
Compass interfered, please be careful of flight
Temperature of aircraft is too high, please land immediately
Approaching to No Fly Zone, it is recommended to return!
You have entered No Fly Zone, please return home immediately
The voltage difference of battery is too large, please charge
Aircraft overloaded, climb velocity slowed down
Please wait the aircraft to be stable before taking off
Tips: The time of a circle is %1$s s
IMU function is disabled during the flight
Moving stick will change the route
Moving stick will change the route when returning
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
Aircraft connection interfered, please restart the aircraft
The version of Mi Live is too old
Switching mode failed, please connect to the RC
Let the aircraft hover in the air, put the camera towards yourself.
In GPS mode the aircraft will take off and hover at 4 meters high, please ensure the aircraft take off in an open area away from crowds
In VPU mode the aircraft will take off and hover at 1 meter high, please ensure the aircraft take off in an open area away from crowds
Aircraft reaching max height, please adjust gimbal angle
TF card error, cannot update normally
Cannnot update, no TF card detected
TF card cannot be updated normally, please replace
No TF card detected, please insert again.
Time out, please try to upload again
Dronie mission over time, please retry
Drone battery lower than 15%, please charge before update
RC battery lower than 15%, please charge before update
"Update will take %1$s minutes, please ensure the battery is fully charged "
%1$s updated failed, it is recommended to restart the device and try again
You can keep flying and update later
Firmware updating, please do not exit
Do not disconnect RC, do not quit update page
During update process, please keep App, RC, Drone connected properly, and Battery is fully charged
Please turn on USB tethering in Phone Setting, connected successfully as shown below
"Please connect Wi-Fi named 'MiRC_ 0B1B41'，the default password is 123456789"
Explore new perspectives with your fingertips
Tips: Do not disconnect RC during update process, do not quit update page
Can only set at most 20 waypoints
The distance between waypoint and home point cannot be exceed 500m
Roll the two dials to the maximum several times
until the displayed dial position is consistent with the actual position
Formatting will remove all data, are you sure you want to proceed?
